td.content: s:a white F aged 20 yrs presents with Kidney x 7 days. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 50.1 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Pyelonephritis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urine culture.

s:a female student aged 20 yrs presents with mild dry mouth, moderate tingling in feet and moderate episodes of palpitations and diaphoresis that occurs after missing meals x 6 weeks. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 49.6 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 14, Heart = RRR, PMI not displaced, no murmurs, normal S1/S2, Eyes = yellowish white discoloration noted on the retina and microaneurysms, appears in NAD, Extremities = no edema, no skin breakdown, 2 + dorsalis pedis pulses a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed HUMALOG - 100 UNITS/ML subcutaneous - pre-meal dosage, and ordered Urinalysis.

td.content: s:white female aged 21 ys presents with moderate lethargy of 2 weeks duration together with severe increased thirst, severe weight loss. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 50.4 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to endocrinology.
